txt.en: '[placeholder]! I have new orders from Scout-master Ausma for you! Our forces have moved into the forested tiers of Clovengap, but reports of crystal-encrusted beasts and dragon-kind concern her greatly. You are to investigate the reports and do what you can to assist the efforts of our troops.\n\n'Look for Gunvald in southern Clovengap. He waits for you at a camp along the river called Stókkset.'
'Ah, [placeholder]! Ausma's runner found you. Welcome to the Forest Beneath the Mountains!'

Ausma has sent word that reports of crystal-encrusted beasts and dragon-kind. You are to investigate the reports and do what you can to assist the efforts of our troops.\n\nYour orders are to look for Gunvald in southern Clovengap. He waits for you at a camp along the river called Stókkset.
Talk to Gunvald in southern Clovengap, at a camp called Stókkset
A runner from Scout-master Ausma has found you. Your orders are to assist Mother Amma on the tiers of Clovengap!
